I came across some folklore while researching the arkai. Supposedly Arkai eggs can grant eternal youth to a powerful sorcerer.

Imagine what esteem we would earn if we gave some to Oshar!"I sense a task for me..."

You're learning to anticipate Oshar's needs, . That's good.

Go around {@LinkCreature:30#1000#Arkai Perch$$Arkaina} and collect eggs.

Be careful. If the {@LinkCreature:30#220#teal arkai} finds you stealing its eggs, it will attack.

Are these the eggs?

They're not as big as I thought they would be. Seem quite ordinary, really.

Should I feed one to a sloth or something first? And if I do, will I have created an immortal sloth-king?
It's not so much that I want the eggs, you see. Oshar wants them, and we are all just Oshar's servants.
